p: From the current study, it may be concluded that EA may confer significant protection against lead-induced nephrotoxicity through their antioxidant mechanisms from oxygen-derived free radicals. This study will be potentially beneficial for segments of population who are chronically exposed to high-level lead pollution. Presence of EA in diet or its consumption as a supplement may keep kidney of affected people healthy and safe. Future studies need to be performed to establish the hypothesis with clinical studies.
